name: GeoParachute (Version 0.8)
description:
GeoParachute is an educational game to learn where cities are located on the globe. The target group would be pupils of geography classes. To modify the game according to the currently discussed continent or according to the age of the pupils, teachers can change the target countries in the "cities.csv" file (for Mac in the "Content" folder, for Windows in the "GeoParachute_Data" folder ).

Navigate the plane, jump, and navigate to the exact location of the target city!

A personal high score makes the game and learning experience more fun and motivating. 

Further, users can switch to "Learning Mode" where the target city is slightly marked on the globe.

Contributers: Axel Schorcht, Paul Anton Rainer, Klara Wichmann, Lina Klass
